name: Nancy Drew Triple Threat
summary:
Play as Nancy Drew and solve the case / A challenging and exciting adventure / ESRB Rating E Everyone Roll the Dice in an Intricate Mini-Game Earn and Spend Euros on Trinkets and Souvenirs at the Castle Store Delve into German Culture Discover Captivating Facts and Local Lore. 
 
Includes games 4, 5, & 6.
